mapper.sql: a.ID, a.USER_ID, a.ACTION_TYPE, a.INFO_TYPE, a.INFO_ID, a.INFO_NAME, a.INFO_VALID, date_format(a.ACTION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as ACTION_DATE_CN, b.INTRODUCTION as INTRODUCTION, case when CHAR_LENGTH(a.INFO_NAME) > 37 then CONCAT(SUBSTR(a.INFO_NAME, 1, 37), '...') else a.INFO_NAME end as SUB_INFO_NAME, case when a.INFO_TYPE = '11501' then '项目' when a.INFO_TYPE = '11502' then '招标' when a.INFO_TYPE = '11503' then '中标' when a.INFO_TYPE = '11504' then '采购' when a.INFO_TYPE = '11505' then '新闻' when a.INFO_TYPE = '11506' then '行业报告' when a.INFO_TYPE = '1' then '关系网' else '' end as INFO_TYPE_CN, case when CHAR_LENGTH(b.INTRODUCTION) > 47 then CONCAT(SUBSTR(b.INTRODUCTION, 1, 47), '...') else b.INTRODUCTION end as SUB_INTRODUCTION, case when a.INFO_TYPE = '11501' then b.ENABLED_FLAG else 1 end as ENABLED_FLAG, case when a.INFO_TYPE = '11501' and b.ENABLED_FLAG = 0 then 'clearfix failure_info zhaobiao' else 'clearfix optional zhaobiao' end as STYLE_CLASS_LI, case when a.INFO_TYPE = '11501' and b.ENABLED_FLAG = 0 then '' else '' end as STYLE_CLASS_BORDER, case when a.INFO_TYPE = '11501' and b.ENABLED_FLAG = 0 then '失效' else CONCAT('') end as STYLE_CLASS_CHECK
mapper.select: select count(*) as num from CMS_CUST_BEHAVIOR a

select
from CMS_CUST_BEHAVIOR a left join CMS_PROJECT b on b.PROJECT_SOURCE_ID = a.INFO_ID
order by a.ACTION_DATE desc
mapper.update: update CMS_CUST_BEHAVIOR set INFO_VALID = #{infoValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ACTION_DATE = #{actionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update CMS_CUST_BEHAVIOR set INFO_VALID = #{infoValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ACTION_DATE = #{actionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where USER_ID = #{userId} and ACTION_TYPE = #{actionType} and
INFO_TYPE = #{infoType} and
INFO_TYPE in ('11501', '11502', '11503') and
INFO_VALID = #{infoValidWhere} and date_format(ACTION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{actionDateWhere}
